name: UMotionTrailToolOptions
doc: TODO: option to make tick size proportional to distance from camera to get a sense of perspective and scale

bShowTrails: Whether or not to show motion trails
TrailColor: The color of the motion trail
bShowFullTrail: Whether or not to show the full motion trail
TrailThickness: The thickness of the motion trail
FramesBefore: The number of frames to draw before the start of the trail. Requires not showing the full trail
FramesAfter: The number of frames to draw after the end of the trail. Requires not showing the full trail
bShowKeys: Whether or not to show keys on the motion trail
bShowFrameNumber: Whether or not to show frame numbers for the keys on the motion trail
bShowMarks: Whether or not to show marks along the motion trail
bLockMarksToFrames: Whether or not to lock the marks to the frames
